item.title: Iveda Solutions Inc S-1
item.description: Iveda Solutions Inc, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC S-1 filing on August 23, 2022 had 31200 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
